predicate.note: Frames file for 'mischaracterize' based on sentences in ebc. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'characterize'.

roleset.name: incorrectly assign a label or attribute

example.name: with attribute
example.text: I think 0 it *EXP*-1 would be a mistake *PRO* to mischaracterize him simply as a tough or a tough guy or a bully.
